name: vis-demos
description: SPA for visualising geojson data (e.g. from a tracker app)

scripts.build: browserify location-tracker/browser.js -o static/location-tracker-bundle.js && browserify hospital-demand/browser.js -o static/hospital-demand-bundle.js && browserify shouldistayathome/browser.js -o static/shouldistayathome-bundle.js

author: Ben Swift, Kathy Reid
